data.caption: Approval Of The Unaudited Financial Results For The Third Quarter And Nine Months Ended 31St December 2023
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 and 33 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015 , we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on February 9th, 2024 has approved the Standalone and Consolidated Unaudited Financial Result of the Company for the third quarter and nine month ended on 31st December, 2023.

data.news_body: Write to inform you that at the meeting of the Board of Director of the Company held today that is Wednesday August 02 ,2023 the Board of Director of the Company has considered and approved the Standalone and Consolidated Unaudited financial result of the Company for the first quarter and three month ended 30th June,2023.

data.caption: Revised Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On May 25, 2023
data.news_body:
With reference to the outcome of board meeting dated 25th May, 2023 you are requested to kindly note that the figures were not legible in the same.
In this regard, we enclose a copy of the revised outcome of the board meeting.
This is for your information and records.

data.caption: Approved Standalone And Consolidated Financial Results Of The Company For The Quarter And Year Ended 31St March, 2023
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 and 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 ('SEBI Listing Regulations'), we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on May 25, 2023, has inter-alia approved the following:
1. The Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and
year ended 31st March, 2023 along with Statement of Assets and Liabilities as on that date. Enclosed is:
a. A copy of the said Financial Results along with Auditor's Report thereon;
b. Declaration of unmodified opinion on the Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results as
per Regulation 33(3)(d) of SEBI Listing Regulations.

data.caption: Approval Of The Unaudited Financial Results For The Third Quarter And Nine Months Ended 31St December 2022
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 and 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 ('SEBI Listing Regulations'), we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on February 9, 2023, has inter-alia approved the following:

1. Standalone and Consolidated Unaudited Financial Results of the Company for the Third Quarter and Nine Months ended on 31st December, 2022 along with the Limited Review Report issued by M/s. Deloitte Haskins & Sells, Chartered Accountants, Statutory Auditors of the Company.
2. Increased the Authorized Capital of the Company and amend the Memorandum of Association of the Company.

data.news_body:
The Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and year ended 31st March, 2022 along with Statement of Assets and Liabilities as on that date. Enclosed is:
a. A copy of the said Financial Results along with Auditor's Report thereon;
b. Declaration of unmodified opinion on the Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results as per Regulation 33(3)(d) of SEBI Listing Regulations.

The Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Statements for the financial year ended 31st March, 2022.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On 04Th February, 2022
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on Friday 04th February, 2022, has inter-alia approved :
1. Un-audited Standalone Financial Results'' and ''Un-audited Consolidated Financial Results'' of the Company for the quarter ended 31st December, 2021 along with ''Limited Review Reports''
2. Conversion of unsecured loan Cumulative Redeemable Non-Convertible Preference Shares.
3. Increase in authorized capital
4. Alteration in Memorandum'' of Association of the Company
5. To create and issue Cumulative Redeemable Non-Convertible Preference Shares
6. Approved material related party transaction
7. Approved to conduct Postal Ballot, Draft of Postal Ballot Notice
8. Approved the cut-off date i.e. Friday, 4th February, 2021 for the purpose of ascertaining the eligibility of shareholders for issuance of Postal Ballot Notice The Board Meeting commenced at 07:05 p.m. and was concluded at 08:40 p.m.

data.caption: To Approve Half Yearly And Quarterly Results For The Period Ended September 30, 2021
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 and 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 ('SEBI Listing Regulations'), we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on today i.e. Friday 29th October, 2021, has inter-alia approved the following:

1. 'Un-audited Standalone Financial Results'' and ''Un-audited Consolidated Financial Results'' of the Company for the quarter and half year ended 30th September, 2021;

2. ''Limited Review Reports'' on the ''Un-audited Standalone Financial Results'' and ''Un-audited Consolidated Financial Results'' of the Company for the quarter and half year ended 30th September, 2021 issued by the Statutory Auditor of the Company

The aforesaid Un-audited Financial Results are also available on the Company''s website - www.nrbindustrialbearings.com

The Board Meeting commenced at 6:50 p.m. and was concluded at 08:30 p.m.

Request you to kindly take the above on record.

2. ''Limited Review Reports'' on the ''Un-audited Standalone Financial Results'' and ''Un-audited Consolidated Financial Results'' of the Company for the quarter ended 30th June, 2021 issued by the Statutory Auditor of the Company

The aforesaid Un-audited Financial Results are also available on the Company''s website - www.nrbindustrialbearings.com

The Board Meeting commenced at 12:30 p.m. and was concluded at 2.00 p.m.

Request you to kindly take the above on record.

data.caption: Results For Quarter And Year Ended 31.03.2021
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 and 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 ('SEBI Listing Regulations'), we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on 12th June, 2021, has inter-alia approved the following:

1. The Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and year ended 31st March, 2021 along with Statement of Assets and Liabilities as on that date. Enclosed is:
a. Declaration of unmodified opinion on the Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results
2. The Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Statements for the financial year ended 31st March, 2021.
3. To hold the 10th Annual General Meeting (AGM) on Saturday, 21st August, 2021 through Video Conferencing.
4. The Board has authorized Key Managerial Personnel's for determining materiality of the event
The Board Meeting commenced at 1.30 p.m. and was concluded at 4.05 p.m.

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On 12Th June, 2021
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 and 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 ('SEBI Listing Regulations'), we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on 12th June, 2021, has inter-alia approved the following:

1. The Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and year ended 31st March, 2021 along with Statement of Assets and Liabilities as on that date. Enclosed is:
a. Declaration of unmodified opinion on the Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results
2. The Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Statements for the financial year ended 31st March, 2021.
3. To hold the 10th Annual General Meeting (AGM) on Saturday, 21st August, 2021 through Video Conferencing.
4. The Board has authorized Key Managerial Personnel's for determining materiality of the event
The Board Meeting commenced at 1.30 p.m. and was concluded at 4.05 p.m.
